title: My under chin feels tight when singing even if I breathe or after I relax my throat. No matter what I do, I feel it tighten as I sing higher or even speak higher. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: That is tension in your tongue. Try massaging the muscle underneath your hin (between your jaw bones) gently as you sing, and see if that releases any of the tension. Also, while singing, pay attention to your tongue and notice if it becomes tight. Endeavor to sing with a free and relaxed jaw and tongue.
